reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel two times.
reviews.title: Its all about the location

reviews.text: The only good thing about it is the location. My last stay was for 10 nights. I checked in very late and it's true they try to sell you more expensive room. I speak fluent Serbian so I told him that all I need is one bedroom. At the end of my stay they still got me. They charged me 10 euros more per night because when I booked the hotel I was given one price and 3 days prior to my arrival the room rate has increased.
reviews.title: A Little Taste of the Eastern Bloc
day of the week floor mats
reviews.text: The breakfast is included, but dont bother, every morning we had eggs with cheese, eggs with ham, aggs with this eggs with that. The restaurant is clean and functional. The lisft is very 70's. The reception is filthy, they smoke and thats nothing unusual.
